section.title: Editing a Bookmark
section.para: You can modify the name and search string of a bookmark.

step.para: Click the Bookmarks tab on the far left side of the screen.
Select the bookmark you wish to edit.
Click the Edit button to open the Edit Bookmark window.
Change the Name and Search string fields as necessary.
Click OK to save the edited bookmark.

section.para: You have edited a bookmarked search query.
